name: [Browser] Frog Brain
description:
Mysterious little frog home. Are you stuck??

Hop around and find out!

WASD/Z/X, if you can't move then refresh the page and don't click until it loads.

A very short game. Once you're unstuck from the home you win :) Made for Lame Jam 26 in three days, with a theme of "control the environment". iykyk! ;)
